scripts.clean: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path .next) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .next }; if (Test-Path out) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force out }; if (Test-Path dist) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist }; if (Test-Path .turbo) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .turbo }; if (Test-Path 'node_modules/.cache') { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force 'node_modules/.cache' }; Write-Host 'Build files cleaned!' -ForegroundColor Green"
